grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 凄惨【セイサン】ghastly, gruesome, appalling, lurid
kun reading compounds: 凄い【すごい】terrible, dreadful, amazing (e.g. of strength), great (e.g. of skills), wonderful, terrific, to a great extent, vast (in numbers), awfully, very, immensely
凄い事になる【すごいことになる】to go crazy (esp. of a situation or thing), to get out of hand, to end up in an extreme state
凄まじい【すさまじい】terrific, fierce, terrible, tremendous, dreadful, awful, amazing, absurd, cutthroat, intense
